column2:
"Wow, wow, wow. Very impressive.
I'm surprised that you can clear that
so easily."

"So it seems that your capabilities are
genuine indeed. It'll be a great thing for
ARKS. Yes, I think so."

"I hope that you can use those capabilities
of yours to help protect ARKS and the
world from now onwards."

"For me, I cannot afford to sit back and
relax, yeah."
